title: Fukigen na Mononokean Tsuzuki (The Morose Mononokean II)
synopsis: Despite being burdened with crippling debt to the morose Haruitsuki Abeno, Hanae Ashiya has come to enjoy his job as an exorcist. His ability to communicate with youkai has given him a sense of responsibility regarding the magical creatures, and he continues to work hard to send them to their true home in the Underworld.
voices: ['Maeno, Tomoaki', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Shimono, Hiro', 'Hashimoto, Chinami', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Itou, Miki']
staff: [['Kawasaki, Itsurou', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Morishita, Hiroto', ['Sound Director']], ['Fukuda, Gen', ['Episode Director']], ['Nagahama, Norihiko', ['Episode Director']]]
